name: Office RPG
description:
CONTROLS:

Move - Arrows, WASD

Interact - Z, J, Alt

Cancel - X, K, Ctrl

Phone - Enter

Missions - Shift

Hi i made this game to learn how to use GBSTUDIO!

Its a recreation of the place i work at...

Walk around, talk to people, complete taks... Simple RPG stuff!

Shout out to these guyz for da assets:

0x72 - 2BitCharactersGenerator

Blank_Pixels - GB Studio Character pack

PixelPete - Pixel Assets

Wintonson - 200000 GB Studio - Sprites

DeerTears for the free music!

Oki bye bye... Quack!
